name: RoleQuest Manager By Snaked
description:
Multi-Map Grid System of 5x5 - 6x6 - 7x7 - 8x8 - 9x9 and 10x10

Online Radio Tuner to listen to players ambient music with more than 60,000 radios around the world (All shoutcast directory) you can also put any URL as long as it is Shoutcast or Icecast

Currently Working on Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Character Blade (Sheet 1) and Basic Starting Rules

Game Manager System on MySQL Online server, everything is stored online on my server that I have in a Hosting in Spain

Keep-Alive Connection System, I have tested it for more than 20 hours without losing the connection with the online Data Server

Integrated chat via IRC client (rooms are created on IRC Chat servers that are always running)

Login and User Registration and Creation of Departure Rooms

System in MySQL Server for the History of the game, this is a Form where the Master is writing events or the argument of the Game, has the option that the Master grants permission so that everyone can write in history and save the changes at any time.

Internet connection required

WARNING: THIS IS A VERSION ON DEVELOPMENT, NOT WORKS COMPLETELY
